## R Markdown

We are plotting the DeKalb County shapefile to figure out if it's accurate and whether we need to follow up on it. 

First, loading/installing packages.

```{r}

install.packages("rgdal")
install.packages("sf")
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(tidycensus)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)

```

## Including Plots

```{r}

dekalb_shapefile <- st_read("Dekalb_Parcels.shp")

```

```{r}

dekalb_shapefile %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  theme_minimal()

library(tigris)
counties <- counties() 

dekalb_county <- counties %>%
  filter(COUNTYFP == "089", STATEFP == "13")

dekalb_county %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf() + 
  theme_minimal()

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data=dekalb_county) + 
  geom_sf(data=dekalb_shapefile) +
  theme_minimal()

```
